subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United was upset by Derby in the League Cup semifinals, losing, 1-0, on a goal in the 30th minute by Kris Commons. Derby, which plays in the League Championship, ended a 14-game unbeaten streak for United, the defending English, European and world champion. United did not start many of its top players, bringing in Cristiano Ronaldo and Wayne Rooney as substitutes. The second leg is Jan. 20 at Old Trafford.
